g:HTMLPanel.p: Reflection is currently in Private Beta. We have invited a select group of developers, publishers and journalists to get a first-hand look.
Do you want early access? We accept developers who have relevant transactional data to improve our statistical forecasting. Partners are required to link their iTunes connect account (no SDK needed).
Ability to feedback on current and future features based on our data.
Revenue and download intelligence at no cost for private beta partners.
